snippet: SCHWALB--Willy, 'Hidden Child', who survived WWII, Dies at 78 on April 7, 2016 in Flushing, Queens. He was born on August 31, 1937 in Vienna, Austria. In 1939, his parents sent him to Brussels, Belgium to escape the Nazis. He was hidden by as many as ten families until WWII ended. Then he entered an orphanage in Auderghem Belgium. He and Nancy Adelle Fox were married in 1973. She died November 28th, 2015. They leave many friends and family: Margit, Winifred, Elizabeth, Beverly, Paul, Jay, Nathan, Georgia, Ursula, and 'cousins' throughout the world. Ironically on March 11, 2016 Willy received Notice from the Crisis Conference that he will receive reparation pension funds from Germany. 1/3
lead_paragraph: SCHWALB--Willy, 'Hidden Child', who survived WWII, Dies at 78 on April 7, 2016 in Flushing, Queens. He was born on August 31, 1937 in Vienna, Austria. In 1939, his parents sent him to Brussels, Belgium to escape the Nazis. He was hidden by as many as ten families until WWII ended. Then he entered an orphanage in Auderghem Belgium. He and Nancy Adelle Fox were married in 1973. She died November 28th, 2015. They leave many friends and family: Margit, Winifred, Elizabeth, Beverly, Paul, Jay, Nathan, Georgia, Ursula, and 'cousins' throughout the world. Ironically on March 11, 2016 Willy received Notice from the Crisis Conference that he will receive reparation pension funds from Germany. 1/3
